title:
A little sanity from +DualShockers after that ReviewTechUSA video:

http://www.dualshockers.com/2013...

attachments.displayName:
A little sanity from +DualShockers after that ReviewTechUSA video:

http://www.dualshockers.com/2013/10/28/fud-video-on-ps4-and-xbox-one-by-reviewtechusa-is-complete-bogus-heres-some-damning-evidence/

This is just refuting one of the claims RTU makes and I'm sure next-gen naysayers will either dig up something else or ignore this obvious contradiction and continue to use RTU to fuel their preconceptions, but at least those who are looking forward to the next generation and Ninty gamers who have also been targeted by this sensationalist idiot can get a little comfort that not every gaming media "professional" is so... unprofessional lol :)

Have you watched the original video?  Did you spot any other glaringly obvious mistakes?  Would you consider trusting RTU in future?

#ReviewTechUSA   #nextgen
